bilingual.source: The economic recovery can be expected soon.

bilingual.target: 政治骚乱导致了经济的不稳定。

bilingual.source: The economic prospect does not look very good.
bilingual.target: 经济的前景看起来不太好。

bilingual.source: The economic impact of the pandemic has been severe.
bilingual.target: 大流行病对经济的影响是严重的。

bilingual.source: The new policy will facilitate rapid economic growth.
bilingual.target: 新的政策将促成经济的快速发展。

bilingual.source: The economic uncertainty has led to widespread unease.
bilingual.target: 经济的不确定性导致了广泛的不安。

bilingual.source: The financial crisis led to a global economic recession.
bilingual.target: 金融危机导致了全球经济的衰退。

bilingual.source: The economic uncertainty brought about widespread disquietude.
bilingual.target: 经济的不确定性带来了普遍的使不安。

bilingual.source: The country's economic policy is heavily influenced by dirigisme.
bilingual.target: 该国的经济政策深受政府对经济的干预的影响。

bilingual.source: Researchers are studying the socio-economic impacts of the pandemic.
bilingual.target: 研究人员正在研究疫情的社会经济的影响。

list.abstract: economic（英 [ˌiːkəˈnɒmɪk , ˌekəˈnɒmɪk]，美 [ˌiːkəˈnɑːmɪk , ˌekəˈnɑːmɪk]），英语单词，形容词，为经济学的；经济的；经济上的。短语搭配有economic crisis（经济危机）。例句为“It outmode our current economic structure.（它使我们目前的经济结构过时了。）”

yingyinNormal.en: Folks, it's long past time to cut the middle class back into the deal so they can benefit from the economic growth they helped create.
yingyinNormal.zh: 朋友们，中产阶级在过去付出了巨大的牺牲，经济的复苏离不开他们的付出，他们理应享受到经济发展的成果。

yingyinNormal.en: And in the process produce a ripple effect that boosts wages for the middle class and spurs economic growth for the United States of America.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并带动连锁反应，不仅提高中产阶级的工资，也将刺激美国经济的增长。

yingyinNormal.en: From the pure economic perspective, you can think all of these is irrational.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从单纯的经济学角度，你可以认为这些都是荒谬的。

yingyinNormal.en: And governments often decide their economic policies assuming such rational actions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而各国通常是在这种「理性」的前提下制定经济政策的。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the nation's cultural, political and financial center and an economic powerhouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是中国的，文化、政治和金融中心，是一个经济重镇。

yingyinNormal.en: The DRC is already wracked with economic hardship, compounded by an unstable government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚果共和国经济本就欠发达，再加上政治局势不稳定。

yingyinNormal.en: You do realize this flies in the face of a 150 years of economic theory? Yes, I do, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要明白这个想法会和现存150年的经济理论有冲撞。教授，我明白。

yingyinNormal.en: Singapore today is one of the Four Asian economic Tigers, a futuristic bridge between East and West.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时至今日，她跃升为亚洲四小龙之一，更是连接东西方的未来桥梁。

yingyinNormal.en: It's important to understand because it's what allowed a housing crisis to become a nationwide economic disaster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是很重要的概念，因为它会让房地产危机成为全国金融危机。

yingyinNormal.en: Just in time for the holiday season, we now have another piece of good news about the pace of our economic recovery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正好赶上节日季，我们现在收到了又一条有关我们经济复苏步伐的好消息。

yingyinNormal.en: Americans have fought their way back from tough economic times but the deck is still stacked in favor of those at the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国已经从艰难的经济形势中恢复，但机遇仍然存在并青睐那些位于顶端的人。

yingyinNormal.en: On Friday, I had a discussion with working women in Rhode Island about the economic challenges they face in their own lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在周五，我与工薪家庭的妇女在罗德岛州就她们在自己生活中所面对的经济挑战进行了讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: Great topic. I can help with that. There are lots of different perspectives you can take: economic, sociological, political.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好主题，我可以帮你，你可以从很多不同的观点来论述，比如经济，社会，政治。

yingyinNormal.en: And that for me is again the promise of behavior economic. It's to say let's kind of figure out people don't behave perfectly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是行为经济学的承诺，它认为人无完人。

yingyinNormal.en: Much like a child getting his pocket money, one of the biggest economic questions is still whether it's better to save or spend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像是个刚拿到零用钱的小孩一样，经济学有个很大的问题就是不知道储蓄还是消费哪个比较好。

yingyinNormal.en: Our economy had plummeted at a rate of 8% in a single quarter part of the fastest economic decline any time in the last half century.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近一个季度的时间经济就下滑8%，这是过去半个世纪以来少有的经济下滑速度。

yingyinNormal.en: Through actually studying economic psychology, I was trying to figure out what are these deeply held beliefs people have are actually wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过学习经济心理学，我试着弄清人们根深蒂固实际上错的信念是什么。

yingyinNormal.en: When the President and I took office in January of 2009, this nation was in the midst of the greatest economic crisis since the great depression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 2009年1月，在总统和我主政之初，全国正深陷自大萧条以来最严重的经济危机之中。

yingyinNormal.en: So most economists believe that while too much of either is dangerous, a small, consistent amount of inflation is necessary to encourage economic growth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以经济学家大多认为，两种情形太严重都很危险，不过适度稳定的通膨，对于刺激经济成长却是必要的。

yingyinNormal.en: So most economists believe that while too much of either is dangerous, a small, consistent amount of inflation is necessary to encourage economic growth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以经济学家大多认为，两种情形太严重都很危险，不过适度稳定的通膨，对于刺激经济成长却是必要的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to the career counselors and experts who study them, Generation Zs are clear-eyed, <highlight>economic</highlight> pragmatists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据职业顾问和研究他们的专家说，Z世代是目光敏锐的经济实用主义者。

examination_example.sentence: Wasted time is a drag on Americans' <highlight>economic</highlight> and private lives, not to mention infuriating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浪费的时间拖累了美国人的经济和私人生活，更不用说令人气愤了。

examination_example.sentence: During the decade before the <highlight>economic</highlight> crisis, spending on legal services in America grew twice as fast as inflation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济危机前的十年里，美国法律服务支出的增长速度是通货膨胀的两倍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: The data set they used did not include <highlight>economic</highlight> data, so instead the researchers looked at whether the 2013-16 wellbeing decline was tracking <highlight>economic</highlight> indicators.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使用的数据集不包括经济数据，因此研究人员研究了2013-16年的幸福感下降是否是在追随经济指标。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>economic</highlight> measures with a more direct impact, like family income and unemployment rates, had no relationship with wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但具有更直接影响的经济措施，如家庭收入和失业率，与幸福感没有关系。

examination_example.sentence: Data reveals that <highlight>economic</highlight> inequality rather than family income might affect people's wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数据显示，影响人们福祉的可能是经济不平等，而不是家庭收入。

examination_example.sentence: For example, this calculation puts <highlight>economic</highlight> welfare in the United Kingdom at 97% of U.S. levels, but estimates Mexican well-being at 22%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，根据这种计算，英国的经济福利水平是美国的97%，而墨西哥的福利水平估计是22%。

examination_example.sentence: Because of these differences, comparing France's consumption with the U.S.'s overstates the gap in <highlight>economic</highlight> welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于这些差异，比较法国和美国的消费夸大了经济福利的差距。

examination_example.sentence: We came across a recently published article by Charles Jones and Peter Knowles, which proposes an interesting new measure of <highlight>economic</highlight> welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们读到了 Charles Jones 和 Peter Knowles 最近发表的一篇文章，文中提出了一种有趣的新的经济福利衡量方法。

examination_example.sentence: That's the highest percentage of an exclusive <highlight>economic</highlight> zone devoted to marine conservation by any country in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上专门用于海洋保护专属经济区的最高比例。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指与 political "政治的"相对而言的"经济的"。
指与"节约"同义的"经济"，含"节约，不浪费"之意。
在名词前作形容词用，相当于 economical，表"节约的"或"经济实惠的"。
指"财务的，金钱的，财政的，财力的"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The call for public engagement with the unthinkable is especially germane in this moment of still-uncontrolled pandemic and <highlight>economic</highlight> crises.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个疫情和经济危机仍未得到控制的时刻，呼吁公众参与不可想象的事情，尤其具有现实意义。

examination_example.sentence: The tiny shops made <highlight>economic</highlight> sense, according to Robert Kerr, a founder of LoveFone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Love Fone创始人Robert Kerr表示，这些小商店在经济上是有意义的。
